text: Michalovce (; , , Romani: Mihalya, Yiddish: Mikhaylovets or Mykhaylovyts; ) is a town in eastern Slovakia. == Twin towns – Sister cities == Michalovce is twinned with: * Vyškov, Czech Republic * Villarreal, Spain * Pančevo, Serbia * Jaroslaw, Poland * Sátoraljaújhely, Hungary ==References== ==Other websites== * Official site Category:Towns in Slovakia Category:Košice Region
title: Michalovce
